about_the_game: SIMP es un emocionante shooter roguelite microscópico. Guía a Gaylord para rescatar a su prometida Zoe de las criaturas del sistema inmunológico, utilizando un arsenal de armas orgánicas y habilidades únicas.

content_descriptors.notes: The game features humor with double entendres, including jokes or item names with suggestive connotations. Additionally, various real-life conditions and diseases are used as inspiration, exaggerated and adapted as elements within the video game.

detailed_description: SIMP es un emocionante shooter roguelite microscópico. Guía a Gaylord para rescatar a su prometida Zoe de las criaturas del sistema inmunológico, utilizando un arsenal de armas orgánicas y habilidades únicas.
name: SIMP: Super Infection Massive Pathology Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: SIMP is an exciting microscopic roguelite shooter. Guide Gaylord to rescue his fiancée Zoe from the creatures of the immune system, using an arsenal of organic weapons and unique abilities.
